comment_body:
Yes, I thought of this after watching Derren Brown's daring and brilliant [Miracles for Sale](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iuP5uOI7Xwc&ab_channel=ScepticaTV). No matter what you believe in, the corruption is real, and fuck that kind of thing.

Constructive criticism is welcome.
Oh god... If I knew what the future held, I'd let my son die. But if I didn't..
